body: cc @dongcarl @fanquake @theuni
For the scripted-diff please use `git ls-files ...` or similar. Otherwise it will change out-of-tree files as well.

Updated fdaeb5207bc58a7c93472d1bac82b2c373d6f1be -> b48fd7bf3f3276f5e21cd7de960a859754b20285 ([pr22552.01](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr22552.01) -> [pr22552.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr22552.02), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr22552.01..pr22552.02)):

- addressed @MarcoFalke's [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22552#issuecomment-886535720)

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23998](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23998) (build: support OpenBSD in depends by fanquake)
* [#23956](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23956) (build: use zeromq 4.3.4 in depends & fix NetBSD 10 build by fanquake)
* [#23955](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23955) (build: add support for NetBSD in depends by fanquake)
* [#23948](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23948) (build: add support for FreeBSD to depends by fanquake)
* [#23839](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23839) (Linux: build with and test for control flow instrumentation on x86_64 by fanquake)
* [#23724](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23724) (build: add systemtap's sys/sdt.h as depends for GUIX builds with USDT tracepoints by 0xB10C)
* [#23340](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23340) (build: upgrade to boost 1.77 to fix c++20 compilation by PastaPastaPasta)
* [#22708](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22708) (build, qt: Add Wayland support for Linux builds with depends by hebasto)
* [#21778](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21778) (POC: LLVM 13 & LLD based macOS toolchain by fanquake)
* [#20744](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20744) (Use std::filesystem. Remove Boost Filesystem & System by fanquake)
* [#10102](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10102) (Multiprocess bitcoin by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Rebased 638133188fa21f17e65e73f08c0ff7b87a58f446 -> ad2a195b616e1822cdd6d47c792cbf21a11df7c5 ([pr22552.03](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr22552.03) -> [pr22552.04](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr22552.04)) due to the conflict with #22840.

> Why might this be happening? This PR hits the nail on the head by attacking the use of recursive variables.

Thanks @jarolrod for your detailed explanation, it wasn't kind of clear to me in the OP what was exactly fragile here, and how it is fixed. I don't know a lot about makefile internals, but avoiding inadvertent issues that could result in wrong builds seems important. Concept ACK.

Would be good if @theuni has a look over the changes I think.
